content: in this free amigurumi crochet pattern i teach how to crochet a chicken birb i call these crocheted fellas birbs because they re really spies in disguise the free chicken amigurumi crochet pattern includes a full length video tutorial and a downloadable pdf this little crocheted chicken amigurumi measures about 3 inches tall when finished and includes a full-length unique video tutorial to help you get through the tough parts includes video tutorials for the more difficult parts of the pattern also includes a printable version **materials needed ** worsted weight yarn size us-g/4 00mm needle to sew in ends scissors a small amount of stuffing plastic safety bead eyes 8mm+ **stitches used ** chain chain stitch st stitch slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet decrease/increase decrease/increase invdec invisible decrease blo back loops only
